objects.text:
Text to Graphic AI
Unleash Creativity at Scale
Transform Designs in Minutes

product_details.name: Phot.AI
product_details.description:
I had a great conversation with Aishwarya Anand from CNBC-TV18 about how Phot.AI is different from other design platforms.

But first, let’s understand the problems with existing design tools:

🚫 You rely on manual processes and multiple apps → complex, bloated workflows
🚫 Rigid templates → lack scalability and flexibility
🚫 GenAI tools → only adjust layout, replace your text and product image
🚫 No support for A/B testing, localization, or retail product-specific intelligence

The result?
Clunky workflows that waste time ⏳, slow manual processes or template-based designs 🛠️, and no easy way to create and test multiple ad variations at scale 🔄.

Text-to-image AI tools (like ChatGPT, Midjourney, Ideogram) are exciting—but let’s be honest:

They don’t work for retail product brands.
Not at scale. Not for banners. Not for business.

🚫 No understanding of brand tone
🚫 No editable design files
🚫 No banner formats
🚫 No A/B testing
🚫 No translation/localization
🚫 No performance-driven thinking

That’s why we’re shifting from Text-to-Image ➝ Text-to-Graphic.

These platforms weren’t built for the fast-paced, data-driven world of retail product marketing, where you need thousands of creative assets across different sizes, languages, and target audiences — all optimized to boost sales 📈💰.

At Phot.AI, we focus solely on retail products. We help brands and sellers with everything — from taking product photos 📸 to cataloging 🗂️, to creating ads and marketing materials 🎨📢.

Most tools force you to:
✋ Do a lot of manual work
📋 Use fixed templates
🔀 Switch between multiple apps

They give you pretty pictures 🖼️ — but not powerful marketing graphics that actually drive sales 💸.

That’s why we built Phot.AI — a new design paradigm.

Our text-to-graphic AI platform combines 5 AI agents working together to:

📷 Create real-looking product photos
🎨 Generate editable graphics and lifestyle creatives that match your brand
✍️🗣️ Write compelling copy and calls-to-action
🔍💥 Produce A/B test variations (colors, copy, backgrounds, sizes, languages, audiences)
🌍🗣️ Translate your ads for global reach

Just enter a prompt, upload a product image or link — and in under a minute ⏱️, you get everything you need.
No hassle. No extra apps.

You’ll receive graphics with all design layers preserved — like your PSD files — giving you full control to edit banners anytime by chatting with the AI 💬 or using our design studio 🎛️ to tweak every detail.

We’re almost ready to launch 🚀 and can’t wait to share this with you!

If you want early access to Phot.AI CoPilot, drop a comment below 👇 or send me a message 📩.
Let’s change retail marketing together!

banner_details:
This promotional banner features a dynamic split-background layout using two angled halves: the left side showcases a deep purple gradient, while the right side contrasts with a vibrant blue-violet hue. A central visual highlight is the full-height image labeled **product_image**, aligned on the right to add human warmth and balance.

The layout begins with a bold, attention-grabbing title **heading** in bright yellow placed at the top-left, followed by a strong subtitle **subheading** in light gray below it. Supporting this, a three-line paragraph **description** offers value propositions. At the bottom, a standout yellow text element **tagline** announces the launch, followed by a red rectangular call-to-action button **cta_button** with bold white **cta_text** inside.

The overall composition combines modern typography with strategic hierarchy and spacing, guided by a clean, tech-inspired aesthetic.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Plum: `#372b48`
- Royal Violet: `#6729f3`
- Bright Yellow: `#ffc93f`
- Coral Red: `#de525a`
- Light Gray: `#ffffffb3`
- White: `#ffffff`
product_color: The product image features a pastel green maternity gown that exudes calmness, comfort, and softness. The primary color is a soft mint green (#B9E6A6), providing a soothing and refreshing visual tone. Embroidered floral accents in white (#FFFFFF) and pale pink (#FADADD) add a gentle decorative touch, enhancing femininity and elegance without overpowering the main color. These colors blend harmoniously, maintaining a uniform pastel aesthetic while ensuring the embroidery is subtly highlighted. Complementary skin tones in warm medium brown (#A56C43) and the neutral tan of the sandals (#CBA67D) add natural grounding to the image. This light, nature-inspired palette can be used in advertisement banners to evoke tranquility and care.
